long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your truck dispatching tasks on www.sylectus.com with the Fastbid Chrome extension. Designed exclusively for Sylectus users, this powerful tool enhances your efficiency, saving you valuable time and effort.

Key Features:

üöö Load Details at Your Fingertips: Easily copy load details with just one click. No more manual copying and pasting.

üìß Effortless Email Communication: Send emails to brokers effortlessly, right from within the load board. Create and use email templates to standardize your communication.

üó∫Ô∏è Integrated Google Maps: Seamlessly view load locations on Google Maps, helping you plan routes and optimize your dispatching.

üì¶ Simplified Load Management: Our extension adds a convenient button for each load, allowing you to perform essential actions in a popup window without altering the website's content.

üì® Customizable Email Templates: Craft and save email templates to speed up your communication with brokers, ensuring professionalism and consistency.

Empower your dispatching operations with the Fastbid. It's the must-have tool for busy truck dispatchers looking to boost productivity and simplify their workflow.

Please note that this extension is exclusively available to Sylectus account holders. It enhances your experience without altering the core website content. Get started today and revolutionize your dispatching process!
